title: A Simpler Way - Crisis as Opportunity (2016).mkv
description:
Fresh from a sold-out premiere, Jordan and Samuel have made available their full length documentary film A Simpler Way: Crisis as Opportunity (Full Documentary).

It was a great night with David Holmgren and Helena Norberg-Hodge joining co-producersâ€™, Jordan Osmond and Samuel Alexander for a panel discussion.

Below we have posted the full documentary of â€œA Simpler Way: Crisis as Opportunityâ€, an inspiring new documentary produced by Jordan Osmond (http://happenfilms.com/) and Samuel Alexander (http://simplicityinstitute.org/). We encourage people to organise their own, non-profit screenings of this important new film in the hope of sparking a broader cultural conversation about the importance of voluntary simplicity, permaculture, and economic relocalisation in an age of limits.

The film can also be purchased for download at Happen Films.  http://happenfilms.com/a-simpler-way/
